ca.mcgill.ecse211.ARR

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.ARR.Display

  • public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create specific static methods for displaying things on the lcd screen. Lcd is static variable initialized during compile so as not to mix things up.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TextLCD lcd

      Displays odometer values on lcd screen.
      static void displayStartScreen()
      Asks the user to start, must press right button to start then clears display and executes prog
      static void displayUSLocalization(int d, double a, double b, double result)
      this method is used to display the parameters for the ultrasonic localization.

      • displayUSLocalization

        public static void displayUSLocalization(int d,
                                         double a,
                                         double b,
                                         double result)
        this method is used to display the parameters for the ultrasonic localization.
        Parameters:
        d - : distance
        a - : alpha - the first falling edge
        b - : beta - the second falling edge
        result - : the final angle

      • displayLightLocalization

        public static void displayLightLocalization(float left,
                                            float right,
                                            double x,
                                            double y,
                                            double theta)
        this method is used to display the parameters for the light localization.
        Parameters:
        left - : left light sensor data
        right - : right light sensor data
        x - : x coordinate
        y - : y coordinate
        theta - : angle
